summary: Localization project: add and maintain translation files for multiple languages.
architectural_notes: Maintain separate translation files per language (e.g., Spanish, French, German).

existing_features.title: Create a complete French (fr) UI translation pack by replacing the current `fr: commonTranslations` fallback with an explicit French dictionary in `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` (i.e., provide French values for all keys currently present in `commonTranslations`, preserving any emojis/icons where they exist).

Create a complete German (de) UI translation pack by replacing the current `de: commonTranslations` fallback with an explicit German dictionary in `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` (i.e., provide German values for all keys currently present in `commonTranslations`, preserving any emojis/icons where they exist).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add French and German language translation files (localization support)

projectName: Add complete French (fr) and German (de) UI translation packs
